metadata.title: USN-4872-1 -- Axel vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Axel did not properly verify the certificates for hostnames. An attacker could use this vulnerability to impersonate another server and obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4872-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  axel - 2.17.5-1ubuntu1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
